attributes.additional_details: The motorists have been charged enough for the useless road surfaces throughout the country. There is more than enough revenue being generating from the motorists through road tax, fines, parking, congestion charges that are spiralling out of control just to name a few.
attributes.background: The government is looking for a plug to reduce the deficit in their  budget and the motorist have endured years of tortures of imposing heavy taxes on cars and yet this is not enough.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560867
